product_name: KAVU Sidewinder Shoulder Bag - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The cotton Sidewinder Shoulder Bag from KAVU unzips along the side to expand as you collect mementos on your travels, and features an attractive rope shoulder strap. Buckle and clip closure on the shoulder strap let you adjust the length and also clip it through a chair back or luggage. Main compartment has a snap closure. Perimeter zipper unzips to expand, zips closed when you have fewer contents. Exterior zip pocket, patch pocket with key clip, and rip-and-stick stash pocket hold plenty of items. The Sidewinder Shoulder Bag from KAVU is made of durable cotton and comes in a variety of colors and fun patterns. Closeout.
short_description: The cotton Sidewinder Shoulder Bag from KAVU unzips along the side to expand as you collect mementos on your travels, and features an attractive rope shoulder strap.
